name: Shattered Night Jade
desc: A nearly weightless black jade, enveloped in chilling flames. If it could be pieced together, perhaps something extraordinary might happen...

value.text:
Completing select World Quests in Natlan
Luxurious Chest in Phlogiston Extraction Research Center

customize.name: Shattered Night Jade
customize.desc: A nearly weightless black jade, enveloped in chilling flames. If it could be pieced together, perhaps something extraordinary might happen...

customize.name: Night Jade
customize.desc: A nearly weightless black jade, enveloped in chilling flames. According to Natlan's legends, offering it at a specific altar might just open the path to the kingdom ruled by the night.

customize.text: is obtained once all are collected, which grants the achievement <color=#ffd780>Offering to Nothingness</color> .

customize.name: Revelations from the Past
customize.desc: You have obtained permission to make a pilgrimage to the volcano from Pacal. Set out with Little One after you finish your preparations.

customize.name: To the Night, What is the Night's
customize.desc: You encounter a strange door out in the wilds of Natlan...

customize.text: Luxurious Chest obtained from rescuing the Saurians trapped in the <color=#ece5d8>Phlogiston Extraction Research Center</color> <color=#ffffff73>.</color>
